parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks for intersection of terrain between two AGL positions. Returns [[true]] if intersects with terrain. For ASL variant see [[terrainIntersectASL]] </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''terrainIntersect''' [pos1, pos2] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [pos1, pos2]: [[Array]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos1: [[Array]] - start position in format [[PositionAGL]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pos2: [[Array]] - end position in format [[PositionAGL]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_intersects = [[terrainIntersect]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPos]] [[player]], [[getPos]] chopper];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_intersects = [[terrainIntersect]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[position]] [[player]], [[position]] enemy1];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[terrainIntersectAtASL]], [[lineIntersectsSurfaces]], [[intersect]], [[lineIntersects]], [[lineIntersectsWith]], [[terrainIntersectASL]], [[lineIntersectsObjs]], [[checkVisibility]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on may 31, 2012 - 10:40 (CEST)
<dt class="note">[[User:Lou Montana|Lou Montana]]
<dd class="note">Please note the difference :
*terrainIntersect
*terrainIntersectASL
*lineIntersect'''''s'''''
*lineIntersect'''''s'''''With
*lineIntersect'''''s'''''Objs 
*intersect

<dd class="notedate">Posted on may 31, 2012 - 10:40 (CEST)
<dt class="note">[[User:Rocket|Rocket]]
<dd class="note">This command is CPU intensive on the engine, be careful with its use.

<dd class="notedate">Posted on Jun 23, 2012 - 17:15 (CEST)
<dt class="note">[[User:Dwarden|Dwarden]]
<dd class="note">This command was changed to ATL and counterpart for ASL was added in build 94049.


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
